data.text: @DanielKelly150 Youre not an anti vaxxer or conspiracy theorist using the word "untested" in that sentence, you're an idiot. Stop looking for likes by talking shite.

@DanielKelly150 Yup. I've not had my invite yet but it'll be a hard pass when it comes. IF I was at significant risk from Covid, I'd likely take it. Seeing as I'm not at risk from Covid and there is a possible risk from vaccination, why would I take it?
@DanielKelly150 What would you regard as the vaccine being ‘tested’ ?
